name: great-ball
effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 1.5×.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A good BALL with a
higher catch rate
than a POKé BALL.
